text: Hi Amelia, this is a great idea. <@U01JAD86TEW> is in the process of setting up a new Accessibility sub-team within Forwards and this may be something they would be willing to work on. It is also related to the R Repositories Working Group (<https://github.com/RConsortium/r-repositories-wg>) - I think there's also been a bit of discussion about updating the CRAN website among that group. So I think it would be most helpful to add an issue there, since that group is meeting regularly to discuss issues raised and it should probably be a collaboration between that group, Forwards and the CRAN team.  If you open an issue and let me know (maybe by pinging @hturner on GitHub), I will respond, since I am willing to follow this up.
